example.parse: (S (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS تعثرت) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_NOM المحادثات)) (PP (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN شأن) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN اقامة) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_INDEF_GEN علاقات))) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC بين) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_DU_GEN البلدين))

arg.g: Discussions regarding the relations between the two countries

example.arg: في شأن اقامة علاقات بين البلدين
